fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.datastore

Interface PersistenceBackend

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPersistenceBackend, BlueprintsPersistenceBackend, HBasePersistenceBackend, MapPersistenceBackend

    public interface PersistenceBackend
extends Closeable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Cleanly stops the underlying data store.
      default Object getAllInstances(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass eClass, boolean strict)
      Back-end specific computation of Resource.getAllContents().
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns whether the underlying data store has been started or not.
      void save()
      Saves the modifications of the owned EObjects in the persistence back-end.

    • Method Detail

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Returns whether the underlying data store has been started or not.

        void close()
        Cleanly stops the underlying data store.
        Specified by:

        Specified by:

      • save

        void save()
        Saves the modifications of the owned EObjects in the persistence back-end.

      • getAllInstances

        default Object getAllInstances(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass eClass,
                               boolean strict)
        Back-end specific computation of Resource.getAllContents().
        Parameters:
        eClass - the class to compute the instances of
        strict - true if the lookup searches for strict instances
        Returns:
        an Object containing the back-end specific objects corresponding to the instances of the EClass
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the back-end does not support all instances lookup
